    • 构造器详细资料

      • EmailAccount

        public EmailAccount(java.lang.String emailAddress,
                    java.lang.String inComingProtocol,
                    java.lang.String inComingServerAddress,
                    int inComingServerPort,
                    java.lang.String inComingServerLogin,
                    java.lang.String inComingServerPassword,
                    java.lang.String outGoingProtocol,
                    java.lang.String outGoingServerAddress,
                    int outGoingServerPort,
                    java.lang.String outGoingServerLogin,
                    java.lang.String outGoingServerPassword)
        API to generate a new email account with base parameters.
        参数:
        emailAddress - Email Address
        inComingProtocol - InComing Protocol: "pop3"/"imap"
        inComingServerAddress - InComing Server Address, should not be null
        inComingServerPort - InComing Server Port, should not be null
        inComingServerLogin - InComing Server Login, should not be null
        inComingServerPassword - InComing Server PassWord
        outGoingProtocol - OutGoing Protocol, should not be null
        outGoingServerAddress - OutGoing Server Address
        outGoingServerPort - OutGoing Server Port,
        outGoingServerLogin - OutGoing Server Login
        outGoingServerPassword - OutGoing Server PassWord
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the essential patrameter is missing or null, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed

      • EmailAccount

        public EmailAccount(java.lang.String emailAddress,
                    java.lang.String inComingProtocol,
                    java.lang.String inComingServerAddress,
                    int inComingServerPort,
                    java.lang.String inComingServerLogin,
                    java.lang.String inComingServerPassword,
                    boolean inComingServerUseSSL,
                    boolean inComingServerUseTLS,
                    boolean inComingServerAcceptAllCertificates,
                    java.lang.String inComingPathPrefix,
                    java.lang.String outGoingProtocol,
                    java.lang.String outGoingServerAddress,
                    int outGoingServerPort,
                    java.lang.String outGoingServerLogin,
                    java.lang.String outGoingServerPassword,
                    boolean outGoingServerUseSSL,
                    boolean outGoingServerUseTLS,
                    boolean outGoingServerAcceptAllCertificates,
                    java.lang.String outGoingPathPrefix,
                    java.lang.String senderName,
                    java.lang.String signature,
                    boolean isDefault)
        API to generate a new email account.
        参数:
        emailAddress - Email Address
        inComingProtocol - InComing Protocol: "pop3"/"imap"
        inComingServerAddress - InComing Server Address, should not be null
        inComingServerPort - InComing Server Port, should not be null
        inComingServerLogin - InComing Server Login, should not be null
        inComingServerPassword - InComing Server PassWord
        inComingServerUseSSL - True to enable the email account setting for incoming server Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)
        inComingServerUseTLS - True to enable the email account setting for incoming server Transport Layer Security (TLS)
        inComingServerAcceptAllCertificates - True to Accept All Certificates when InComing Server
        inComingPathPrefix - Incoming Server Path Prefix
        outGoingProtocol - OutGoing Protocol, should not be null
        outGoingServerAddress - OutGoing Server Address
        outGoingServerPort - OutGoing Server Port
        outGoingServerLogin - OutGoing Server Login
        outGoingServerPassword - OutGoing Server PassWord
        outGoingServerUseSSL - True to enable the email account setting for outgoing server Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)
        outGoingServerUseTLS - True to enable the email account setting for outgoing server Transport Layer Security (TLS)
        outGoingServerAcceptAllCertificates - True to Accept All Certificates when Outgoing Server
        outGoingPathPrefix - OutGoing Server Path Prefix
        senderName - User name for outgoing messages
        signature - Signature to use with the account
        isDefault - True to make this account the default
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the essential patrameter is missing or null, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed
